comment: I took his online class and it was easy. he replaces the lowest test grade with the final test grade which led me to get a 100% as my final grade in the class. im not good at science but the class is very doable.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Online Savvy

comment: Lectures weren't especially useful but it's cool because he gives a bonkers amount of extra credit that means you can kinda do whatever you want. Easy way to knock out biology

I had him for a summer program called PRESS. He was awesome! He always had us finish early so we could get to lunch before the line, which says to me that he is super caring and intentional. His class has a great mix of lectures, labs, and his style of teaching also allows for you to get to know your classmates well and create lasting friendships!

though I didn't have him for long but during the PRESS program he showed us how caring of teacher he is, he's lenient, and willing to show students their mistakes and help them and these are characteristics found in teachers who ACTUALLY love their job. If i could have him during my fall semester for bio lab, I would be relieved!!!

I had this professor for the Summer Press program. He made this program an amazing experience. He is very caring about your learning experience and curiosity. Everything explained is easily understandable and he's not afraid to go over it multiple times if you're struggling. It is very easy to engage in conversation with him and peers in the class.
He's a very nice person and will be flexible with you and explain topics whenever asked.

He teaches like he likes to teach idk if that makes sense. He doesn't over complicate things & he shares his own mnemonics/ advice. He plays music before, after, and in independent work time, but it's actually a fire playlist. He tries to make class fun and it was tbh! I recommend the front rows of seats tho because he speaks a bit quietly. :)
I had him for CSM PRESS and he was great. Very hands on and engaging. Would definitely could take him for the real class if I could.

I took him for CSM PRESS summer bridge program, all content was applicable to the subjects and was fun to learn. He's also hilarious and very hands on with his teachings, heavily recommend him as a professor.
I had Mr.Trinh during PRESS and he was a great professor. I would definitely recommend you take his class.
He good, trust.
He is very kind, and funny, he makes sure you understand it and will thoroughly explain it for you.
Iv'e had him for PRESS program 100% would take him again. He is literally the GOAT he explains things perfectly and he will always make you feel comfortable.
Very good ! Gpa boost !!
He is a good professor, very funny. I had him for a summer program and he was amazing! Funny and very helpful!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Has a very hands on approach, and makes learning in class fun and interactive.

I absolutely loved having him as my teacher. I will say though in order for you to pass you have watch the lectures and go through the powerpoint but its not crazy. Super nice guy, if you need help, he will help you. Homework is worth a lot so do them and don't wait last minute. would 100% take him again. I had him for my regular bio class-1107

If you are looking to take your bio lab online, I would say he is your best choice. He is very understanding and does his best to make sure everyone is doing well. There is one proctored exam, which is the final, but everything else is pretty smooth as long as you do your part. Two of your labs will be with a group and the others you do yourself.

Looking at the other ratings it may have been the TA who graded badly. The professor is ok, but if you think this class is going to be 1 credit worth of effort think again. Taking off 0.3 out of 25 pts for a peer review without explanation is insanity, and the grading for everything else was honestly similar. Petty and good luck getting an ok group
He is very nice. There are two group projects, and you do not pick your groupmates, so be aware of that. The course was overall easy, but it felt repetitive at times.
rating_tags: Group projects--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: You'd have to try really hard to fail with him. Really easy course honestly. Very communicative, ready to ask questions, weekly announcements. Really enjoyed it (even if I'm not very passionate about bio)
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class--Online Savvy

comment: Super light content and super chill, would definitely take him again if he's teaching intermediate level courses

You have 14 quizzes, 2 attempts each, and the 2 lowest quiz grades dropped. You have 8 homework assignments, at least 2 discussion posts, 4 Exams, and 1 Final. Quizzes & Exams have Lockdown+Webcam. I only passed 1 exam and ended up with a B+ in the course. Replaces lowest exam grade with the grade on the final. Complete ALL extra credit.

10/10 would recommend!!! His deadlines are clear and all quizzes and exams are super easy. He isn't a tough grader and gives lots of leniency. He's easily accessible and helps as much as he can. There's a decent amount of work, but none too hard. There is group work, but it isn't hard as long as y'all work together. GREAT CLASS!!!
Great professor! Lab worksheet's are gone over in class, two group projects, two practicums, and a few extra credit opportunities. Fast email replies as well.

Cam was so awesome! The best lab prof. I've had yet. He's attentive, helpful, and connects with everyone on a different level. He also makes it super easy to make an A in the class being that he goes through every question on the worksheet and helps answer it, he truly just wants everyone to succeed.

Honestly he was a good professor. Chill and makes class interactive. Clear instruction's, attendance is mandatory. He likes students to participate, which pays off later on .There  was a couple of group projects but nothing to complicated, follow his instructions and rubric and you will be fine! 100% recommend him!

Cam was great! I can't wait to take him again in the future; he's super attentive and helpful. If you listen and participate when he asks questions to the class as a whole he'll literally go through almost every question and help the class answer them. This lab is already fun and easy and he makes it that much more easier to make an A off the bat!

Professor Trinh was great and was very willing to help when needed. He more than teaches the materials just for the sake of teaching and is knowledgeable. Tech savvy and sets clear expectations at the beginning of the course.

He's a really good professor. very patient and kind to everyone, makes the class worth going. He also very funny with easy to follow lectures. Gives good and straightforward feedback on the projects that you will be doing. overall he's just a pretty cool teacher.
Cam is a good Professor cares about his students just don't take his remarks personally.
Cam is such a fun lab instructor. He is always happy to help, his grading is fair and the class is not hard if you show up, read the PowerPoints and do the work. Take him for lab!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: As long as you come to class and pay attention you will pass.
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Accessible outside class

comment: He has made my experience in the Lab so much fun. From the first day I knew that he was going to be a great professor. He has so much enthusiasm. I would 100% recommend him for lab.
super organized and fast grader. 10/10.
Very thorough, clear, and attentive instructor. If you do what is expected of you, you will receive an A.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Truly gives the best feedback.
Very fast runner. Epic guy
If you come to class you will pass.
Great professor! He showed lots of care during labs and attended to each lab station in times of needing help. Explained every lab very well in PowerPoint slides before performing each lab.
Very outgoing professor he is engaged with students and always providing feedback and ways to help!
Professor Cam was a great professor. He explains every single lab and makes sure you know what you are doing. he is very passionate about bio is is VERY helpful.
Very entertaining and made topics easy to understand
W professor, be wary of who you pair with in lab, they will be a major contributor to two large projects due in the class.
I think he is a great teacher. Very caring and understanding, you should take him. He has an energetic personality. You would not be disappointed. Makes sure you understand the concept.
Just an amazing professor to be around, is willing to help you out as much as possible.
The best. Very caring and takes time with you to solve your problem fully
He could teach biology to a 5 year old
A great professor, if you have the chance I 100% recommend taking him. Like seriously, I guarantee it will be hard to fail this course if you have him.
This was fun. Would do again if I didn't pass the class. Worth failing the class to take him again because he is that good.
Awesome teacher
definitely take this guy if you want an A in lab!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Was very entertaining and energetic
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Loved Cam's class! He was very clear with his instructions and made labs so easy to follow and understand. Even if you weren't sure about the material, he took his time to explain everything thoroughly to ensure your success in the class.

I had Professor Trinh for my lab and SCM classes. He is very caring and wants you to do well in his class. He is great at lecturing and making sure that you understand what he is saying, stopping periodically to make sure nobody has any questions. His rubrics give very clear instructions and are easy to follow. I loved having him as my teacher!
There is ALOT of group work but he's great and teaches well.

Loved Cam's class however I found lab difficult in doing experiments and my lab partner... if you don't know how to calculate or do something ask for help/ figure it out its important. Cam goes over information in-depth as well as patient.

Was honestly outstanding teacher and person. Cared about the students well being and made sure the material being taught was broken down to acquire it easier. Made the class better, I would highly recommend taking him.

He has a bright personality and is very understandable once you get to know him. And he's quite chill and very helpful whenever you feel stressed and confused. And also, he's a very cool guy to talk to as well.
Very fun class, would absolutely take again

Professor Trinh was a great instructor. He was very in tune with his students and attending to our needs. He was very understanding and was not a tough teacher. I would most definitely take him again in any course.

This professor was one of the best professors. Personally, this material isn't easy to learn, but he made it seem very easy. He responded to emails ASAP when you had a question. He was always helpful. There was extra credit if your grade wasn't the best. Overall, take him if you need this class!
Take Cam if you want to understand biology and enjoy going to class every day. He is an amazing professor and an even better friend. Let the reviews speak for themselves. TAKE HIM!

Very understanding when it comes to outside circumstances and stress in other classes. Willing to work with you to figure out how to best help with tricky topics as well as address more personal concerns with respect and grace. Cam is a very caring, informative, thorough professor and does not give much homework.

Cam is my favorite professor so far. He always makes lab interesting and I always looked forward to coming to lab. He made us all feel like a family and become close with our peers. He is very clear on instructions and will always help out if a student is struggling. I would take Cam's class any chance I get.
rating_tags: Group projects--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: My goat. He explains everything thoroughly and is available for help whenever you ask. The assignments weren't too hard just as long as you participate in every class you should receive an A. Also study for that final in detail don't do like how I did.

He will help you with whatever if you ask him to, his lectures weren't too long and made it easy for everyone to understand what was going on for the lab. I personally loved this class and if you want a professor that actually cares about your grade then take Cam's class!!
Very fun class, would take again.

JUST SUCH A GREAT PROFESSOR! Probably the best 1107 lab teacher anyone could ask for. He's always available to help and wants all his students to succeed in his class. He gives extra credit and the lab work is super straightforward. All around such a chill dude, and everyone loves him. If you're able to, TAKE HIM. His class is an easy A!
The best professor I ever had !
As long as you do the worksheets and focus during labs you will get a good grade. Great professor, explains labs well, very understanding, and fun! Not a harsh grader, read worksheets thoroughly.
I would definitely go back in time to take his class again. As long as you do your work, and continue to put in effort you should be able to pass the class easily. He is the best teacher!
Make the labs very simple and easy
Would take the class again. Easy to get behind but if you attend every meeting and do your work its an easy A.
He was amazing and willing to help you with anything.
If you get the chance to take a class with cam, don't think twice! He is so awesome and I hope to have a class with him in the future.
Great professor and always tries to make the labs not boring. Real caring guy and you can tell he cares about what he teaches and his students.

Professor Cameron is a great person. He really cares about his students and jokes around as well. He helps his students understand the content and if you have any questions you can email him and he will answer your emails right away.

This may be the greatest professor I've ever had. I hate biology, this class was mandatory for my major, but Cameron made everything simple to understand and enjoyable, and he was very helpful in making sure everyone had a passing grade. If you have to take this class then it would be a serious crime to not take him.
Cam is an amazing professor who dedicates his time to helping students understand the criteria of the class. He is patient and knows what he is talking about! Take him!!

Cam is a fantastic professor, he was very lenient on late work and was extremely nice. He was not a tough grader and didn't give too much homework. He was very entertaining during the lectures and was very personable. I would definitely recommend taking him if you are looking forward to being hands on and having a fun time doing experiments.
Cam is great. He will help you with whatever you need. He is very understanding, and just an overall great guy/prof. If you have the chance to take him, TAKE HIM. you won't regret it.
Great teacher, highly recommend. Assignments are straight forward and clear grading and gives great feedback on work.
Cameron Trinh is an amazing professor. He gives very clear directions and cares deeply for his students. He always answered emails very quickly. Highly highly recommend taking his class!!!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Cam is AMAZING! If you can take his lab def take it. I would take it again and again for sure. Very helpful, easy grader, makes a college lab not feel like one!
Very cool person. Highly recommend taking him. Very easy labs but study for final !!!

Cam is the best professor ever! He really takes the time to make sure that everyone understands whats going on. He is so smart and super cool I highly recommend him. Take him if you can he's a hidden gem.
cool teacher, cool grading, cool feedback, serious but not too serious, if I could I'd give a 10/10
Cam is a great teacher and is real chill.
Great
He is extremely caring, competent, and reasonable. Your success is his top priority!

He he super sweet and worked with me multiple times when I was having a hard time with my mental health. Quizzes, tests, homework, and discussions so a lot to do in the class. Honestly what saved me was the bonuses, take advantage of it. Chapter 1-8 tend to be more difficult but, the end gets better! This professor is great.

Be ready for heavy lectures! However, he makes it so you can understand the material. He offers study guides, reading guides, & a summary of notes from each chapter. There are 4 Discussions (lowest dropped), 14 Quizzes (2 lowest dropped), 8 Total HW (for summer semester), 4 Tests, & 1 Final. He is easily accessible outside of class!

"Prof. Trinh is an exceptional instructor. His passion for the material is evident, but what sets him apart is putting students first. He breaks down problems step-by-step, making complex concepts easy to grasp. Patient, transparent, and dedicated. Wish I had him for more classes!" I earned an A-, but it's because I missed a few early quizzes.
